feed.title: Stormkit Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stormkit: Release v1.9.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Implement deploy now button by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/3
  • Update README file to cover environment variables by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/9
  • Chore: adds common rules in .eslintrc by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/12
  • feat: Add pagination for bitbucket repositories by @aerophobic in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/13
  • Enhance user experience in bitbucket repository list by @aerophobic in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/17
  • Chore: fix eslint errors and warnings by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/16
  • Fix: error page after login by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/21
  • Adds newline rule by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/18
  • Chore: updates packages and adds loader TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/23
  • Typescript migration spinner component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/30
  • Chore: create file to help IDEs by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/35
  • Fix: tsconfig and remove jsconfig by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/36
  • Feat: Settings page by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/32
  • Typescript logo migration by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/34
  • Typescript link migration by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/33
  • feat: Add pagination for github repositories by @aerophobic in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/20
  • Fix: Github pagination by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/37
  • Refactor: improve UX and design by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/38
  • Refactor: restructure pages folders by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/39
  • Account page by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/40
  • Typescript infobox migration by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/41
  • Refactor: migration of section form to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/43
  • Refactor: migration of form description to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/42
  • Rename Apps.context.js to App.context.js by @KevSlashNull in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/49
  • Refactor: migration of select form to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/44
  • Refactor: migration of explanation box to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/47
  • Refactor: migration of outsideClick component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/46
  • Refactor: migration of switch form to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/45
  • Accounts page continued by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/50
  • Fix: typescript support for tailwind purge by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/51
  • Refactor: TS migration of the back button by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/53
  • Refactor: TS migration of the provider button by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/52
  • Refactor: TS migration of the plus button by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/54
  • Feature: continue accounts page by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/55
  • Refactor: migrate toggler to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/56
  • Refactor: TS migration of option component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/57
  • Accounts page continued by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/58
  • Handle subscriptions by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/60
  • Fix: infobox type by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/59
  • Now the menu can be closed by clicking out of it. by @filippofinke in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/64
  • Refactor: migration of copybox to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/68
  • Refactor: migration of EnvironmentSelector to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/67
  • Create Code of Conduct file by @wtphilip in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/69
  • Refactor: removes unused button form component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/71
  • Refactor: deletes unused error component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/70
  • Refactor: migration of modal component to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/66
  • Refactor: migration of success component to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/65
  • Fix: Update publish backend endpoint by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/72
  • Feat: redirect paths starting with app to apps for compatibility by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/73
  • Feat: hide free credits section for now by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/74
  • Doc: Update preview endpoint by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/77
  • Fix: fix default toggle value by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/79
  • Fix: broken tests by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/80
  • Transform deployments to typescript by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/81
  • Fix: refreshing deployments by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/82
  • Refactor: migrate form component to typescript by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/84
  • Remove styled-components by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/85
  • Fix load more by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/86
  • Add filters to deployments page by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/87
  • Refactor: improve typescript coverage by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/88
  • Refactor: migrate last form files to typescript by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/90
  • 4 implement pagination by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/91
  • Fix: redirect the user to auth page when an XHR request fails by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/92
  • Refactor: migrate Api to typescript by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/93
  • Refactor: revert using typescript in tests by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/94
  • Fix: failing tests with datetime by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/95
  • Refactor: migrate remaining files in components folder to ts by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/96
  • Refactor: migration menulayout to TS by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/97
  • Refactor: ts migration header by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/101
  • Refactor: ts migration usermenu by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/100
  • Refactor: ts migration of default layout by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/99
  • Fix: form select API change by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/103
  • Refactor: TS migration of user component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/106
  • Fix: empty JSON responses by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/110
  • Fix: deployment tips by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/111
  • Chore: run prettier by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/113
  • Refactor: ts migration of center layout by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/98
  • Create prettierrc config file by @KevSlashNull in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/115
  • Refactor: ts migration of UserMenu component by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/107
  • Refactor: ts migration of logout folder by @ivanlori in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/102
  • Fix: open popup function by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/118
  • Add code editor for snippets by @eldemcan in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/122
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump react-dev-utils from 9.1.0 to 11.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/119
  • Chore: update package order by @svedova in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/124
  • Add sentry integration for monitoring errors by @eldemcan in https://github.com/stormkit-io/app-stormkit-io/pull/125
